Sept. 15, 1979 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four) 440 Own Choice Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-fourth-section
Test Piece Contest
Homage to Pharaoh
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £35 and trophy, 2nd £25, 3rd £15. 8 bands competed. 21st annual contest.
May 28, 2014, 6:53 a.m. March 29, 2017, 7:43 p.m.
1 Kirkby Colliery Welfare Band Roy Walters
2 Riddings Band W. J. Saint
3 Rivington and Adlington Band Valerie E. Roocroft
